title: Cuddle me
body:
Peter Parker x Male reader

Fandom: Marvel (Spider-Man: Homecoming)
Genre: Fluff, a hint of angst
Requests (by anon): Hi! How about peter Parker x male dancer reader who trying really hard and just wants some cuddles after a long day??? Thanks!! ❤️
Warning: Mentions of death, Homophobia, language, a hint of angst
Pairing: Peter Parker (Holland) x male reader
Word count: 1144
Y/N= Your Name
Author’s Note: Sorry that it took me so long to finidh this, hope you like it!

Requests and Ships are open

Masterlist

Your heart felt like it was going to burst when you could finally lay down after stretching and training for hours. The heat of your heavy breath was just a taste of how exhausted you were and how hard you were trying.

All your muscles hurt, and you could barely move, but this was the only way to improve your dancing skills. You had been training like this every day for the last month, because the competition you had signed up for was in a few weeks and you’ve already been told by many of your fellow dancers, that this competition would be rough and probably the hardest you had done so far.

Finding motivation for training like this had been easy. Your boyfriend Peter was always by your side and watched you dancing. He bought you coffee when you needed it and kept encouraging you. Peter tried to find time between his Stark internship and after school activities to visit you and go to the training with you. The two of you were alone there most of the time, so it was okay if you didn’t master every single move.

You were still laying on the ground, when you heard Peter talking to you.

“Y/N? Are you okay or do I have to call 911?” Peter said in a tone that was the perfect middle between sarcasm and real worry. You forced yourself to smile and closed your eyes.

“Peter, I think I’m dying. I want you to burn my dead body and let Captain America sing Hallelujah by Jeff Buckley in front of my grave,” you said jokingly, and Peter chuckled. In the next moment, he dropped a dry towel on your face, as well as a water bottle.

“I’ll get the Hulk to hold a speech at church for you.” He helped you to sit up and gave you a weak smile. He could see that you were in pain. After a while he said, “You’ll get dressed and I’m going to wait for you outside.”

You walked into the changing room and opened your locker. There was warm steam coming from the shower, so you assumed that it was the other guy who was training for the competition. He was training in the second room and usually finished later than you did. You didn’t know his name, but you definitely didn’t like him. He had been mean to Peter and you a few times now, so you tried to avoid him by leaving earlier, which didn’t always work out.

You changed from your sweaty t-shirt to a new one and once you had pulled your jeans above your knees, the other guy stepped out of the shower. Water was dripping from his hair and he grinned when he saw you.

“You are still training, even after what I told you last time. You aren’t good enough for this competition. This is something for the good guys, not gays like you,” He teased. You rolled your eyes and stuffed your bag with your old clothes.

“Ignoring me doesn’t help. I’ll beat you. That’s what I can say for sure.” You hated him so much. He didn’t know when to shut up. He was just like this one guy Peter had told you about a few times. Flash. The sort of person you hated. Egoistic, mean and probably pretty insecure on the inside was the best way to describe people like him.

“Fuck off,” was all you said before leaving.

You stepped outside into the cold. It felt like the wind was freezing the sweat on your forehead to little ice cubes. You shivered and walked over to Peter, who was already waiting for you.

“Do you remember this asshole that keeps mocking us?” Peter nodded as a reply. “I just met him while I was changing. He’s still an asshole.” You stuffed your hands in the pockets of your coat.

“It doesn’t matter what he says. You’re going to win this thing,” Peter told you. “He just wants you to give up, because he knows that you’re better than him.”

You let out a deep sigh. “Maybe you’re right, but he’s also very good. Have you seen that guy? He’s amazing.”

Peter shrugged. “You’re still the best.” The small clouds that escaped your mouth when you laughed mixed with the air around you. “You have to say that, because you are my boyfriend!”

Peter unlocked the door to the flat he shared with his aunt. You dropped your bag in the entrance to his room and dropped on the bed, Peter next to you.

“Everything hurts,” you voiced your complaint. Peter looked at you from the side.

“Sit up,” he demanded, and you did what he told you without asking. Peter’s hands travelled over your back to massage your sore muscles. He straightened your shoulders to get in between your shoulder blades with his fingers. You sighed in relief when he fixed your hard muscles and wanted to lean into his touch, but Peter told you to sit straight. His hands travelled up and down your spine, causing you to shiver.

“Thank you, Peter,” you whispered as soon as he was done. You laid on the bed while Peter got up.

“Where are you going?” you asked, and Peter turned around on the doorstep.

“I wanted to make some food,” he replied, but you shook your head.

“No! Come here and cuddle me!” you shouted at him. “You can’t leave me laying here alone like a wet bag of sand!” Peter started smiling slightly. He walked towards you and slipped under the covers on his mattress. You did the same and found yourself in your boyfriend’s arms. You cuddled into him and rested your head on his shoulder. He placed a small kiss on your forehead while drawing lines on your back with his fingertips. His warmth calmed you down and allowed you to finally relax. You smiled and closed your eyes.

“This is perfect,” you muttered into his shirt after he pulled you closer.

“It is.” Peter’s voice was soft and full of love. The warmth of his body was inviting you to snuggle into him. You buried your face in his shirt and smiled to yourself while closing your eyes.

“That guy from dancing probably doesn’t have something like this,” Peter said and you could feel his breath on your forehead.

“Maybe,” you muttered. “But I don’t want think about sad things right now.” Peter sighed and caressed your hair with his hand.

“You’re right.” He kissed your forehead once again.

“This is all I need after a day like this,” you admitted, and you felt Peter’s chest vibrating softly when he chuckled.

“I know. Me too.” You lifted your head off his chest to look him in the eyes.

“I love you,” you whispered before connecting your lips.

summary: Ca s'est passé un… 17 août : Naissance de Luxo, logo de Pixar
title: Ca s'est passé un… 17 août : Naissance de Luxo, logo de Pixar
body:
En 1986 : sortie aux Etats-Unis de Luxo Jr, premier court-métrage Pixar



Ce premier film avait pour vocation de démontrer la qualité des images de synthèse. Celles-ci apportent entre-autre un renouveau au niveau des effets d’ombre. Il fallait choisir un modèle. C’est alors que John Lasseter prit l’objet qui se trouvait devant lui : une lampe de bureau de la compagnie Luxo.

Le film, totalement muet, s’ouvre sur un bureau. Une balle arrive en roulant et cogne le pied d’une lampe articulée. Bien qu’elle la renvoie, la balle revient toujours. C’est alors qu’elle aperçoit une petite lampe qui joue en sautillant. On dirait un petit chiot qui invite le grand à jouer. Mais dans sa fougue, il écrase le jouet qui se dégonfle… Luxo Jr, la petite lampe est triste quand elle apprend que l’objet est définitivement perdu. Mais, oh surprise, c’est un joli ballon qui arrive. Le jeu peut reprendre ! La grande lampe se tourne alors vers le public … un peu résignée ?

Ce court-métrage sera nommé aux Oscar dans la catégorie « court-métrage d’animation » … ce qui n’était jamais arrivé pour un film en images de synthèse !


Le 17 août c'est aussi…




En 1954 : sortie aux Etats-Unis de La Grande Prairie

C’est un film documentaire que propose les studios Disney pour une série intitulée True-Life Adventures. C’est lors d’un voyage en Alaska en 1948 et la rencontre d’un photographe, Alfred Milotte, que Walt Disney prend la mesure de l’importance de transmettre des idées écologiques. La Grande Prairie s’inscrit dans cette visée. Sa réalisation a été confiée à James Algar, déjà oscarisé. Le film nous montre la richesse des grandes prairies entre Rocheuses et Mississippi, mais qui sont en voie de disparition. Un Oscar du meilleur film documentaire et un British Academy Film Award viendront le récompenser.



En 1987 : sortie aux Etats-Unis de Red’s dream

Après Luxo Jr, John Lasseter revient à la réalisation d’un court-métrage Pixar. Cette fois, c’est un monocycle qui est mis en scène. Il rêve… “Je suis est la vedette, bien plus que ce clown!”. Les applaudissements du public retentissent. Mais ce ne sont que les gouttes de pluie. Triste réalité, grand soupir… et attente.



En 1998 : fermeture de Captain EO à Disneyland Paris

Cette attraction présentait un film futuriste. C’est Francis Ford Coppola qui avait été chargé de la réalisation. Le chanteur pop rock Michael Jackson tenait le rôle-titre. Créée en 1986 pour le parc Epcot, elle était présente dès l’ouverture du parc en France. Si on décide de la remplacer en 1998 pour Chérie j’ai rétréci le public, elle reviendra de 2012 à 2015 en hommage au roi de la pop.


Et encore …


En 2006 : Sortie de Frère des ours 2 aux Etats-Unis

102e long-métrage d'animation des studios Disney, le film fait bien sûr suite à Frère des ours, sorti en 2003. Il nous raconte de nouvelles aventures de Kinaï qui a choisi sa peau d’ours.



En 2010 : ouverture de Toy Story Playland à Paris

C’est au Parc Walt Disney Studios que sera ouvert pour la première fois un espace réservé aux jouets de Toy Story. Après l'accueil de Buzz et une fois votre taille adaptée à celle des objets du film, vous avez le choix entre trois attractions. Allez-vous tenter une chute libre en parachute avec les soldats verts ? Ou monter dans un véhicule propulsé sur un arc de cercle ? Une attraction plus calme peut-être ? Vous pouvez faire un tour sur le dos de Zig Zag …



En 2011 : Sortie de Captain America – First Avenger

Voilà le 5ème volet de l’univers Marvel. Le film nous présente Steve Rogers. D’apparence banale, il deviendra une sorte de super-soldat durant la seconde guerre mondiale. Voilà Captain America qui assure les missions les plus difficiles afin de sauver le monde.



En 2016 : sortie en France de Peter et Eliott – le film

Un peu plus d’un mois après avoir conquis les Etats-Unis, c’est la France qui découvre les aventures du jeune orphelin et du gentil dragon.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Read the full article

title: Swaparoo
body:
Request: (Peter Parker x Fem!Reader) Can I get a genderbent peter parker X genderbent reader maybe one of Tony experiments go wrong and we turn into genderbent us. And we have to survive the week like that I’m Imagining flash flirting with peter

Warnings: mentions of female and male body parts, boners and beware, lots of second hand emmbarassment might happen ;)

Word Count: 1722

A/N: This was quite fun to write. I changed up the request a bit hope you don’t mind, and it’s a little jumpy but still hope you enjoy!

Hope you enjoy, feedback is always welcome!

Send an ASK to be added to my permanent tag list! Requests are now closed.

“No no no no no! I do not want this penis!” you screamed at Tony. With fire in your eyes, you were fuming, and he backed away, holding up his hands in fear.

“I never thought I would hear that sentence before.” Peter giggled and blushed when he realized he said it outloud, gaining your angry attention.

Glaring at him, you closed your hands in fists,“Shut it Parker. You literally have huge rack right now. You must be in heaven. Me on the other hand, have a fucking penis!”

Peter gulped, backing away slowly with Tony.

Tony cleared his throat, “I’m so sorry guys. But I must saw, Y/N you make a very handsome boy, and Peter, you make quite a lovely girl!” trying to make the mood a little lighter but failing miserably as you just continued to glare at the two of them.

“Oh come on Y/N, yeah I know I messed up, but it’s not Peter’s fault. Don’t be mean to him to.”

You grumbled, realizing he was right, “Sorry Pete. You, uh, do make a pretty girl though!” you said grinning at him.

He pouted, obviously not liking where you were going. “Seriously though Pete, your hair is so nice and long, and golden brown, and my lord, don’t you have the nicest pair of eyebrows I’ve ever seen. And don’t get me started on that ass I saw earlier!”

“Oh shut it!” he exclaimed, but grinning at your teasing mood. He turned to Tony, “Mr. Stark, please tell me that machine can change us back!”

He rubbed the back of his head, glancing between your and Peter’s hopeful eyes, and the machine that started this whole gender swap. “Uh, yeah. But you need to give me a couple days.”

“Days?!” you and Peter both exclaimed in unison, mouths wide open, looking at him in shock.

“Yeah! So shoo” he said, pushing the both of you out of his lap, “I need to get started, so leave, and try not to get in any trouble. I’ll call the school and clear you guys for the week.”

Peter tried to turn around, “No! I can’t miss the whole week! Please Mr. Stark!”

“Well, you can’t go to school as a girl, can you? Well you could be called Patricia or something.” Tony giggled at his own joke, before closing the door to his lap, leaving you both on the other side.

Letting out a loud sigh, you glanced at Peter in complete despair, “What the fuck are we going to do for a whole week?!”

*****

Hours later you found yourself on the couch, with Peter’s legs on your lap, watching a movie. After getting into some looser clothing, you were slightly more comfortable in this body, but Peter was having a really hard time. He kept moving his hair around, because it kept getting in his face. When he huffed, trying to blow a single strand out of his face, you pushed his legs of of you.

“Okay, Pete, come here,” you motioned, for him to sit in front of you. “I’ll braid your hair, so it’s out of your face.

Sitting up right, you positioned yourself, and ran your fingers through his long hair.

You stopped suddenly when you heard a soft moan come from Peter. He stiffened when he realized that it came from him when he felt the softness of your fingers carding through his hair.

“Peter. Was that a moan I heard?”

He chuckled nervously, not making eye contact with yo, “Uh. Um, I really like it when people play with my hair and massage my scalp, but no one really does it anymore. Probably because no one really thinks to play with a boy’s short hair.”

With all seriousness in your voice, “Okay, when we get back into our normal bodies, I’m totally gonna give you daily head rubs. I can’t have my bestie missing out on his desired massages.”

He gave you a big smile, and relaxed again as you started to braid the hair into two neat french pigtail braids.

After putting in the ties, securing the two braids, you gave his hair one final check before flashing him an approving grin. Once you attention went back to the screen however, Peter stayed just as close to you.

*****

“Peter. How the fuck do you aim?” you yelled to Peter who was just on the other side of the bathroom door, trying to help you go pee.

“Just grab it and point how hard is it?” any other day, and Peter would have turned bright red at the conversation he was having, but due to the fact he literally had a set of boobs, he’s gotten past simple bodily functions.

A few minutes later with more huffing and puffing from you, you walked out the bathroom, your face heated from embarrassment, looking down at the ground not wanting to look at Peter.

“Was it really that hard Y/N.”

“No, but i’m just crossing my fingers you get your period within the week.”

He let out a playful gasp, “Ah, how rude! You wouldn’t miss that on your most horrible enemies!”

“Yeah you’re right.” you smiled, “No one should ever endure period cramps, but I know that until Tony fixes us, I’m free from worry!”

“Yeah… I’m really really hoping it won’t be my “time of the month,”’ he said, air quoting time of the month, causing you to giggle at his silliness.

*****

“Oh my god!” you screamed, brushing your chin and cheeks, feeling the bristles of facial hair growing.

Peter ran into the bathroom, and looked around wildly, looking for whatever startled you.

When he looked at you in confusion, you exclaimed, “I have shit growing out of my face.”

Peter started cackling, the kind where he bended over from laughing to hard, hands on knees, gasping for breath.

At his reaction, you started to giggle, realizing how odd the situation was. Quickly you joined him, laughing loudly, joining him on the floor. Both still giggling crazily, Tony walked by seeing the two of you on the floor, looking like maniacs.

“Do I even want to ask?” cocking an eyebrow at the sight.

Barely able to fit words around your laughter you squeezed in, “Nope. Not at all.”

After Tony left, and you and Peter had quieted down, now gasping for breath, he asked you if you knew how to shave your face.

“Not at all. I can do legs for days though!”

“Okay then,” he said, getting off the floor, and grabbing your arm, pulling you up with him, “I’m gonna help you out.” He looked at him in confusion, so he continued. “I can see you sort of are freaking out about the hair, so I’m going to help you shave.”

You were hesitant, but really wanting Peter do shave your freaking face, but when he mad you sit on the counter, you just went with it.

He stood in between you open legs, grabbing the shaving cream that was in the cupboard. Squeezing some onto his hands, he slowly rubbed it onto your face, looking up at you eyes to make sure what he was doing was okay.

You nodded, gulping slightly, before he grabbed his razor and started to shave. It felt similar to shaving your legs, just a little more sensitive.

Leaning in closer, you could feel his breath on your skin. His tongue poked out a little with his concentration on making sure he didn’t nick you.

At his actions, a shiver ran through your body, and before you realized what was happening, you could feel your pants getting tighter around your crotch area.

Holy fucking shit. I’m getting a fucking boner.

Shifting your legs slightly you tried to not let notice it, but at your fidgeting, Peter looked at you questioningly.

“What’s wrong?” He looked down when you shifted your legs a little more, and saw what you were so desperately trying to hide. “Oh my God. Do you have a boner right now?”

You looked down embarrassed, but he continued, “Ha! I turn you on, thats awesome! Wait, is it because I’m a girl?”

“No! I most definitely like boys, I just, just don’t know how to work this ‘machinery’.” You responded motioning to your junk.

“Yeah, boners are awful! When you would wear that red dress of yours it was always so hard to-” Peter abruptly stopped when he realized what he was saying, his cheeks turning bright red in seconds. He cleared his throat and went back to cleaning off the razor.

“Wait, hold on a second Parker. Do you like me?”

“Well not right now. I don’t bat that way if you know what I mean, but uh, yeah. I do.”

The biggest spin spread on your lips, joy coursing through you at the thought that Peter liked you back.

“Then Peter Parker, get ready from a big ol’ kiss from me as soon as we get our old bodies back, okay?”

He smiled back, grinning at what you were saying. “I would love nothing more.”

*****

“Okay kids, I finally finished fixing the machine!”

“Yes!” you and Peter exclaimed at the same time. While it didn’t take a whole week, it was several days of being a boy for you. And while it was amazing to learn that Peter liked you back during that time, you just wanted your old body back.

“Let’s get this show on the road!”

You and Peter both stepped into the machine that started this whole mess a couple of days ago. You were just hoping it would work and not making it any worse. With a blast of light, and what felt like wave after wave of energy blasts hitting you from all angles, you held back a scream at the overwhelming sensory overload.

Numbness spread over your body, and as soon as you stumbled out of the machine, you grabbed the mirror that Tony was holding towards you.

You let out a breath at the sight of your normal self. Relief washed over you when you saw Peter stumble out as well, in his adorable little male body.

You both made eye contact, and smiles spread over your faces.

“Well Y/N, I think you owe me a kiss now.”

Request: (Peter Parker x Fem!Reader) Can I get a genderbent peter parker X genderbent reader maybe one of Tony experiments go wrong and we turn into genderbent us. And we have to survive the week like that I’m Imagining flash flirting with peter

Warnings: mentions of female and male body parts, boners and beware, lots of second hand emmbarassment might happen ;)

Hope you enjoy, feedback is always welcome!

“No no no no no! I do not want this penis!” you screamed at Tony. With fire in your eyes, you were fuming, and he backed away, holding up his hands in fear.

“I never thought I would hear that sentence before.” Peter giggled and blushed when he realized he said it outloud, gaining your angry attention.

Glaring at him, you closed your hands in fists,“Shut it Parker. You literally have huge rack right now. You must be in heaven. Me on the other hand, have a fucking penis!”

Peter gulped, backing away slowly with Tony.

Tony cleared his throat, “I’m so sorry guys. But I must saw, Y/N you make a very handsome boy, and Peter, you make quite a lovely girl!” trying to make the mood a little lighter but failing miserably as you just continued to glare at the two of them.

“Oh come on Y/N, yeah I know I messed up, but it’s not Peter’s fault. Don’t be mean to him to.”

You grumbled, realizing he was right, “Sorry Pete. You, uh, do make a pretty girl though!” you said grinning at him.

He pouted, obviously not liking where you were going. “Seriously though Pete, your hair is so nice and long, and golden brown, and my lord, don’t you have the nicest pair of eyebrows I’ve ever seen. And don’t get me started on that ass I saw earlier!”

“Oh shut it!” he exclaimed, but grinning at your teasing mood. He turned to Tony, “Mr. Stark, please tell me that machine can change us back!”

He rubbed the back of his head, glancing between your and Peter’s hopeful eyes, and the machine that started this whole gender swap. “Uh, yeah. But you need to give me a couple days.”

“Days?!” you and Peter both exclaimed in unison, mouths wide open, looking at him in shock.

“Yeah! So shoo” he said, pushing the both of you out of his lap, “I need to get started, so leave, and try not to get in any trouble. I’ll call the school and clear you guys for the week.”

Peter tried to turn around, “No! I can’t miss the whole week! Please Mr. Stark!”

“Well, you can’t go to school as a girl, can you? Well you could be called Patricia or something.” Tony giggled at his own joke, before closing the door to his lap, leaving you both on the other side.

Letting out a loud sigh, you glanced at Peter in complete despair, “What the fuck are we going to do for a whole week?!”

*****

Hours later you found yourself on the couch, with Peter’s legs on your lap, watching a movie. After getting into some looser clothing, you were slightly more comfortable in this body, but Peter was having a really hard time. He kept moving his hair around, because it kept getting in his face. When he huffed, trying to blow a single strand out of his face, you pushed his legs of of you.

“Okay, Pete, come here,” you motioned, for him to sit in front of you. “I’ll braid your hair, so it’s out of your face.

Sitting up right, you positioned yourself, and ran your fingers through his long hair.

You stopped suddenly when you heard a soft moan come from Peter. He stiffened when he realized that it came from him when he felt the softness of your fingers carding through his hair.

“Peter. Was that a moan I heard?”

He chuckled nervously, not making eye contact with yo, “Uh. Um, I really like it when people play with my hair and massage my scalp, but no one really does it anymore. Probably because no one really thinks to play with a boy’s short hair.”

With all seriousness in your voice, “Okay, when we get back into our normal bodies, I’m totally gonna give you daily head rubs. I can’t have my bestie missing out on his desired massages.”

He gave you a big smile, and relaxed again as you started to braid the hair into two neat french pigtail braids.

After putting in the ties, securing the two braids, you gave his hair one final check before flashing him an approving grin. Once you attention went back to the screen however, Peter stayed just as close to you.

*****

“Peter. How the fuck do you aim?” you yelled to Peter who was just on the other side of the bathroom door, trying to help you go pee.

“Just grab it and point how hard is it?” any other day, and Peter would have turned bright red at the conversation he was having, but due to the fact he literally had a set of boobs, he’s gotten past simple bodily functions.

A few minutes later with more huffing and puffing from you, you walked out the bathroom, your face heated from embarrassment, looking down at the ground not wanting to look at Peter.

“Was it really that hard Y/N.”

“No, but i’m just crossing my fingers you get your period within the week.”

He let out a playful gasp, “Ah, how rude! You wouldn’t miss that on your most horrible enemies!”

“Yeah you’re right.” you smiled, “No one should ever endure period cramps, but I know that until Tony fixes us, I’m free from worry!”

“Yeah… I’m really really hoping it won’t be my “time of the month,”’ he said, air quoting time of the month, causing you to giggle at his silliness.

*****

“Oh my god!” you screamed, brushing your chin and cheeks, feeling the bristles of facial hair growing.

Peter ran into the bathroom, and looked around wildly, looking for whatever startled you.

When he looked at you in confusion, you exclaimed, “I have shit growing out of my face.”

Peter started cackling, the kind where he bended over from laughing to hard, hands on knees, gasping for breath.

At his reaction, you started to giggle, realizing how odd the situation was. Quickly you joined him, laughing loudly, joining him on the floor. Both still giggling crazily, Tony walked by seeing the two of you on the floor, looking like maniacs.

“Do I even want to ask?” cocking an eyebrow at the sight.

Barely able to fit words around your laughter you squeezed in, “Nope. Not at all.”

After Tony left, and you and Peter had quieted down, now gasping for breath, he asked you if you knew how to shave your face.

“Not at all. I can do legs for days though!”

“Okay then,” he said, getting off the floor, and grabbing your arm, pulling you up with him, “I’m gonna help you out.” He looked at him in confusion, so he continued. “I can see you sort of are freaking out about the hair, so I’m going to help you shave.”

You were hesitant, but really wanting Peter do shave your freaking face, but when he mad you sit on the counter, you just went with it.

He stood in between you open legs, grabbing the shaving cream that was in the cupboard. Squeezing some onto his hands, he slowly rubbed it onto your face, looking up at you eyes to make sure what he was doing was okay.

You nodded, gulping slightly, before he grabbed his razor and started to shave. It felt similar to shaving your legs, just a little more sensitive.

Leaning in closer, you could feel his breath on your skin. His tongue poked out a little with his concentration on making sure he didn’t nick you.

At his actions, a shiver ran through your body, and before you realized what was happening, you could feel your pants getting tighter around your crotch area.

Holy fucking shit. I’m getting a fucking boner.

Shifting your legs slightly you tried to not let notice it, but at your fidgeting, Peter looked at you questioningly.

“What’s wrong?” He looked down when you shifted your legs a little more, and saw what you were so desperately trying to hide. “Oh my God. Do you have a boner right now?”

You looked down embarrassed, but he continued, “Ha! I turn you on, thats awesome! Wait, is it because I’m a girl?”

“No! I most definitely like boys, I just, just don’t know how to work this ‘machinery’.” You responded motioning to your junk.

“Yeah, boners are awful! When you would wear that red dress of yours it was always so hard to-” Peter abruptly stopped when he realized what he was saying, his cheeks turning bright red in seconds. He cleared his throat and went back to cleaning off the razor.

“Wait, hold on a second Parker. Do you like me?”

“Well not right now. I don’t bat that way if you know what I mean, but uh, yeah. I do.”

The biggest spin spread on your lips, joy coursing through you at the thought that Peter liked you back.

“Then Peter Parker, get ready from a big ol’ kiss from me as soon as we get our old bodies back, okay?”

He smiled back, grinning at what you were saying. “I would love nothing more.”

*****

“Okay kids, I finally finished fixing the machine!”

“Yes!” you and Peter exclaimed at the same time. While it didn’t take a whole week, it was several days of being a boy for you. And while it was amazing to learn that Peter liked you back during that time, you just wanted your old body back.

“Let’s get this show on the road!”

You and Peter both stepped into the machine that started this whole mess a couple of days ago. You were just hoping it would work and not making it any worse. With a blast of light, and what felt like wave after wave of energy blasts hitting you from all angles, you held back a scream at the overwhelming sensory overload.

Numbness spread over your body, and as soon as you stumbled out of the machine, you grabbed the mirror that Tony was holding towards you.

You let out a breath at the sight of your normal self. Relief washed over you when you saw Peter stumble out as well, in his adorable little male body.

You both made eye contact, and smiles spread over your faces.

“Well Y/N, I think you owe me a kiss now.”
